results.text: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
results.textEnhanced: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.

results.text: “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
results.textEnhanced: “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.

results.text: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;
results.textEnhanced: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;

results.text: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.
results.textEnhanced: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.
